name: Make up & Hair Salon for Girls
name_original: Make up & Hair Salon for Girls
description:
Enjoy the amazing experience of working in your own Makeup salon! Are you a good hairstylist? Let’s start working in ton of fun virtual environment. Presenting you a lot of new animations, beautiful backgrounds and amazing characters. Deal your customers as better as you can. Help them pick the best outfit. There are thousands of them for brides, party dresses and casual dresses for every kind of event. Pick up some nice shoes matching to the dress. Give your customer a perfect makeover of their dreams.
A Perfect Fashion Stylist:
• Smooth and relaxing controls and transitions
• Haircut, Hair dressing and Hair Styling Tasks
• Makeup and Make over of Hundreds of customers
• Dress up in different Outfit combinations
